Thanks to Iconian Fonts @ dafont.com for the slick looking Tekken Font !
This app is a non-official app, for you to have an easier time learning the game.
It allows you to write down combos, and access them later in a nice, visually attractive way.
You can also use the Notes functionality to write down any information you find relevant about a particular character, and consult these when you want (before a tournament set, for example).
Enter a tag for your note
